description: This file defines a set of React components for a customizable UI menubar, utilizing Radix UI primitives and lucide icons. It includes components for menu, group, portal, radio group, submenu, items, labels, separators, and shortcuts, with styling and forwarding refs for accessibility and flexibility.

methods.name: MenubarMenu
methods.description: A wrapper component for Radix UI Menu component, passing through props.

methods.name: MenubarGroup
methods.description: A wrapper component for Radix UI Group component, passing through props.

methods.name: MenubarPortal
methods.description: A wrapper component for Radix UI Portal component, passing through props.

methods.name: MenubarRadioGroup
methods.description: A wrapper component for Radix UI RadioGroup, passing through props.

methods.name: MenubarSub
methods.description: A wrapper component for Radix UI Sub component, adding a data-slot attribute.

methods.name: Menubar
methods.description: Main menubar component with styling and ref forwarding.

methods.name: MenubarTrigger
methods.description: Component for the trigger button of the menubar, with styling and ref forwarding.

methods.name: MenubarSubTrigger
methods.description: Component for submenu trigger, with optional inset styling.

methods.name: MenubarSubContent
methods.description: Component for submenu content, with animated and styled container.

methods.name: MenubarContent
methods.description: Component for the main menu content, with portal and styling.

methods.name: MenubarItem
methods.description: A menu item component with styling and optional inset.

methods.name: MenubarCheckboxItem
methods.description: Checkbox menu item with indicator icon.

methods.name: MenubarRadioItem
methods.description: Radio button menu item with indicator icon.

methods.name: MenubarSeparator
methods.description: Separator line component for menu separation.

methods.name: MenubarShortcut
methods.description: Component for displaying shortcut hints in menu items.
